Author: wallflowerbitca
Text: Extreme hunger and extreme starvation adaption. Took years for my body to stop doing it after my first lot of weight restoration... my body almost seems to preempt starvation/weight loss and do its darndest to prevent it. My blood sugar and blood pressure drop very rapidly when I skip a meal as though forcing me to eat. Very frustrating. You have to give your body time to heal and trust you again when it comes to eating before you can consider dieting.

Author: selfcontrolwya
Text: yes, it’s extreme hunger. i don’t have any advice but just know it’s completely normal and an effect of prolonged starvation/restriction (but i’m also not a professional that’s just what i’ve read)
